node_info.name: splitOut
node_info.description: Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items

properties.name: fieldToSplitOut
properties.description: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.
properties.placeholder: Drag fields from the left or type their names
properties.hint: Use $binary to split out the input item by binary data

properties.name: include
properties.description: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items

properties.name: fieldsToInclude
properties.description: Fields in the input items to aggregate together

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

options.name: disableDotNotation
options.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

options.name: destinationFieldName
options.description: The field in the output under which to put the split field contents

options.name: includeBinary
options.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new items

subProperties.name: disableDotNotation
subProperties.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

subProperties.name: destinationFieldName
subProperties.description: The field in the output under which to put the split field contents

subProperties.name: includeBinary
subProperties.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new items

placeholders.text: Drag fields from the left or type their names

hints.text: Use $binary to split out the input item by binary data

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
